content.question: Four parallel plate capacitors all have the same plate area and have the plate separations shown above. Both capacitors <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> have air between the plates, while the space between the plates of both capacitors <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is filled with a dielectric slab of dielectric constant <math alttext="kappa equals 2 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Îº</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> . Which of the following correctly ranks the capacitors in order of their capacitance from largest to smallest?

choices.label: <math alttext="B is greater than, open parenthesis, A equals D, close parenthesis, which is greater than C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>B</mtext><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>D</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, A equals C, close parenthesis, which is greater than open parenthesis, B equals D, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>B</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>D</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="C is greater than, open parenthesis, A equals D, close parenthesis, which is greater than B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>D</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, B equals D, close parenthesis, is greater than open parenthesis, A equals C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>B</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>D</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="D is greater than C, which is greater than B, which is greater than A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>D</mtext><mo>></mo><mtext>C</mtext><mo>></mo><mtext>B</mtext><mo>></mo><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="C is greater than, open parenthesis, A equals D, close parenthesis, which is greater than B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>A</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>D</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
